objects.string: (The game will automatically end after 3 minutes.)

parameters: "Each hoop you score nets you one point for your team. First to reach 10 points wins!"
"Every time you score, you gain one life and the opponents lose one life! First to reach 0 lives loses."
"Score 4 goals before your opponent scores 1 goal, to win!"
